title: 17-year-old shot in drive-by
content:
A drive-by shooting left a 17-year-old seriously injured early Saturday in south Laredo, police said.
The teen, who was shot in the 2900 block of Pine Street, was airlifted to a San Antonio hospital.
No arrests have been made.
To provide information on the case, call police at 795-2800 or Crime Stoppers at 727-TIPS (8477).
